content.json: # Well-Architected Security Assessment Workbook For more information visit [Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/framework/security/)

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
resourceContainers | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups'
| project resourceGroup
| order by resourceGroup asc

parameters.name: TagName
parameters.label: Tag Name
parameters.query:
Resources
| where tags != '' and tags != '[]'
| mvexpand tags
| extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(tags)[0])
| distinct tagName
| order by tagName asc

parameters.name: TagValue
parameters.query:
Resources
| mvexpand tags
| extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(tags)[0])
| extend tagValue = tostring(tags[tagName])
| where tags != '' and tags != '[]' and tostring(bag_keys(tags)[0]) == '{TagName}'
| distinct tagValue
| sort by tagValue asc

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| extend Problem = tostring(properties.displayName),
         AffectedResource = tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Id),
         Status = tostring(properties.status.code),
         Description = tostring(properties.metadata.description),
         Severity = tostring(properties.metadata.severity),
         Remediation = strcat("https://", tostring(properties.links.azurePortal))
| where Status == "Unhealthy" and isnotempty(Severity)
| where "{ResourceGroup}" == "value::all" or resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| extend ResourceGroup = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId, "/resourceGroups/", resourceGroup)
| project AffectedResource, Problem, Severity, Remediation, ResourceGroup, subscriptionId, Description
content.title: Defender for Cloud recommendations
content.noDataMessage: You are following all of our security recommendations

content.query:
securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
    | extend Problem=properties.displayName,AffectedResource=tolower(properties.resourceDetails.Id),Status=properties.status.code,Description=properties.metadata.description,Severity=properties.metadata.severity,Remediation=strcat("https://",properties.links.azurePortal)
    | where Status=="Unhealthy" and isnotnull(Severity)
    | project AffectedResource,Problem,Severity,Remediation,resourceGroup,subscriptionId,Description
    | join ( resources | mvexpand tags | extend  AffectedResource=tolower(id), Tags=tags, resourceGroup 
    | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(tags)[0])
    | extend tagValue = tostring(tags[tagName]) ) on AffectedResource
    | extend ResourceGroup=strcat("/subscriptions/",subscriptionId,"/resourceGroups/",resourceGroup)
    | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
    | project  AffectedResource,Problem,Severity,Remediation,ResourceGroup,tagName,tagValue,subscriptionId,Description
content.title: Defender for Cloud recommendations
content.noDataMessage: You are following all of our security recommendations

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards"
| extend 
	passedControls = trim (' ', tostring(properties.passedControls)), 
	failedControls = trim(' ',tostring(properties.failedControls)), 
	state 		   = trim(' ', tostring(properties.state)), 
	unsupportedControls = trim(' ', tostring(properties.unsupportedControls)), 
	skippedControls     = trim(' ', tostring(properties.skippedControls))
| project subscriptionId, name, passedControls, failedControls, unsupportedControls, skippedControls ,  link = "https://portal.azure.com/?feature.customportal=false#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/22"
| order by passedControls desc
content.title: Regulatory Standards Compliance

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
| parse id with * "/regulatoryComplianceStandards/" ComplianceStandard "/" *
| extend Description = properties.description
| extend State = properties.state
| extend Passed = properties.passedAssessments, Failed = properties.failedAssessments, Skipped = properties.skippedAssessments
| where ComplianceStandard == "{standardName}" and subscriptionId=="{subscriptionId}"
| project name, ComplianceStandard, Description, State, Passed, Failed, Skipped, subscriptionId
| order by name asc
content.title: {standardName}

content.query:
securityresources 
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
| parse id with * "/regulatoryComplianceStandards/" ComplianceStandard "/" *
//| parse id with * "/regulatoryComplianceControls/" ComplianceControl "/" *
| where ComplianceStandard == "{standardName}"
| extend assessment = name
| join (securityresources| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments" | extend assessment=name,Problem=properties.displayName,AffectedResource=properties.resourceDetails.Id,Status=properties.status.code,Remediation=strcat("https://",properties.links.azurePortal),Severity=properties.metadata.severity
| parse AffectedResource with * "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/" *
| parse AffectedResource with * "/resourcegroups/" RG "/" *) on assessment
| where subscriptionId=="{subscriptionId}" and RG in ({ResourceGroup}) and Status != "Healthy"
| extend ResourceGroup=strcat("/subscriptions/",subscriptionId,"/resourceGroups/",RG)
| project ComplianceStandard,AffectedResource,Problem,Severity,Status,Remediation,ResourceGroup,subscriptionId
content.title: Affected resources

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards"
| extend 
	passedControls = trim (' ', tostring(properties.passedControls)), 
	failedControls = trim(' ',tostring(properties.failedControls)), 
	state 		   = trim(' ', tostring(properties.state)), 
	unsupportedControls = trim(' ', tostring(properties.unsupportedControls)), 
	skippedControls     = trim(' ', tostring(properties.skippedControls))
| project subscriptionId, name, passedControls, failedControls, unsupportedControls, skippedControls ,  link = "https://portal.azure.com/?feature.customportal=false#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/22"
| order by passedControls desc
content.title: Regulatory Standards Compliance

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
| parse id with * "/regulatoryComplianceStandards/" ComplianceStandard "/" *
| extend Description = properties.description
| extend State = properties.state
| extend Passed = properties.passedAssessments, Failed = properties.failedAssessments, Skipped = properties.skippedAssessments
| where ComplianceStandard == "{standardName}" and subscriptionId=="{subscriptionId}"
| project name, ComplianceStandard, Description, State, Passed, Failed, Skipped, subscriptionId
| order by name asc
content.title: {standardName}

content.query:
securityresources 
| where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
| parse id with * "/regulatoryComplianceStandards/" ComplianceStandard "/" *
//| parse id with * "/regulatoryComplianceControls/" ComplianceControl "/" *
| where ComplianceStandard == "{standardName}"
| extend assessment = name , resourceGroup
| join (securityresources| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments" | project assessment=name,Problem=properties.displayName,AffectedResource=tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Id),Status=properties.status.code,Remediation=strcat("https://",properties.links.azurePortal),Severity=properties.metadata.severity
| parse AffectedResource with * "/subscriptions/" subscriptionId "/" *
| parse AffectedResource with * "/resourceGroups/" RG "/" *) on assessment
| join ( resources | mvexpand tags | extend  AffectedResource=id, Tags=tags ,resourceGroup
| extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(tags)[0])
| extend tagValue = tostring(tags[tagName]) ) on AffectedResource
| where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}' and Status != "Healthy"
| extend ResourceGroup=strcat("/subscriptions/",subscriptionId,"/resourceGroups/",RG)
| project ComplianceStandard,AffectedResource,Problem,Severity,Status,Remediation,tagName,tagValue,ResourceGroup,subscriptionId
content.title: Affected resources

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/pricings"
| extend PricingTier = tostring(properties.pricingTier)
| summarize DefenderEnabled=countif(PricingTier == "Standard") by subscriptionId
content.title: Microsoft Defender (CWP) Enabled

parameters.name: numberOfAlerts
parameters.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | where properties.Status in ('Active')
  | count
  | project numberOfAlerts = Count

content.json: ## The selected subscription(s) have no alerts

content.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | where properties.Status in ('Active') and isnotempty(resourceGroup)
  | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
  | mvexpand Resource=properties.ResourceIdentifiers
  | where isnotempty(Resource.AzureResourceId)
  | extend ResourceGroup=strcat("/subscriptions/",subscriptionId,"/resourceGroups/",resourceGroup)
  | project ResourceName=Resource.AzureResourceId, Alert=tostring(properties.AlertDisplayName) , TimeGenerated=tostring(properties.TimeGeneratedUtc), Severity=tostring(properties.Severity),Type=tostring(properties.AlertType) , Remediation=properties.AlertUri,Intent=tostring(properties.Intent),Details=tostring(properties.ExtendedProperties),ResourceGroup,subscriptionId
content.title: Active Security Alerts

content.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | where properties.Status in ('Active') and isempty(resourceGroup)
  | mvexpand Resource=properties.ResourceIdentifiers
  | where isnotempty(Resource.AzureResourceId)
  | extend ResourceGroup='N/A'
  | project ResourceName=Resource.AzureResourceId, Alert=tostring(properties.AlertDisplayName) , TimeGenerated=tostring(properties.TimeGeneratedUtc), Severity=tostring(properties.Severity),Type=tostring(properties.AlertType) , Remediation=properties.AlertUri,Intent=tostring(properties.Intent),Details=tostring(properties.ExtendedProperties),ResourceGroup,subscriptionId
content.title: Active Security Alerts

content.json: ## Microsoft Defender (CWP) needs to be enabled for the subscription(s) you choose to be able to view alerts

content.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | where properties.Status in ('Active')
  | mvexpand Resource=properties.ResourceIdentifiers
  | where isnotempty(Resource.AzureResourceId)
  | extend ResourceName=tostring(Resource.AzureResourceId), Alert=properties.AlertDisplayName , TimeGenerated=properties.TimeGeneratedUtc, Severity=properties.Severity,Type=properties.AlertType , Remediation=properties.AlertUri,Intent=properties.Intent,Details=properties.ExtendedProperties
  | project ResourceName,Alert ,TimeGenerated, Severity,Type, Remediation,Intent,Details,resourceGroup,subscriptionId
  | join ( resources | mvexpand tags | extend  ResourceName=id, Tags=tags, resourceGroup 
  | extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(tags)[0])
  | extend tagValue = tostring(tags[tagName]) ) on ResourceName
  | extend ResourceGroup=strcat("/subscriptions/",subscriptionId,"/resourceGroups/",resourceGroup)
  | where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
  | project ResourceName,Alert ,TimeGenerated, Severity,Type, Remediation,Intent,Details,tagName,tagValue,ResourceGroup,subscriptionId
content.title: Active Security Alerts

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securescores"
| where properties.environment == "Azure"
| extend subscriptionSecureScore = round(100 * bin((todouble(properties.score.current))/ todouble(properties.score.max), 0.001))
| where subscriptionSecureScore > 0
| project subscriptionSecureScore, subscriptionId
| order by subscriptionSecureScore asc
| summarize AverageScore = toint(avg(subscriptionSecureScore))
content.title: Overall Secure Score
content.noDataMessage: No secure score calculated for the selected subscription(s)

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Overall Secure Score of selected subscriptions

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securescores"
| where properties.environment == "Azure"
| extend subscriptionSecureScore = round(100 * bin((todouble(properties.score.current))/ todouble(properties.score.max), 0.001))
| where subscriptionSecureScore > 0
| project subscriptionSecureScore, subscriptionId
| order by subscriptionSecureScore asc
content.title: Secure Score per Subscription
content.noDataMessage: No secure score calculated for the selected subscription(s)

parameters.name: ControlArea
parameters.label: Control Area
parameters.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securescores/securescorecontrols"
| extend Control=tostring(properties.displayName)
| distinct Control

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securescores/securescorecontrols"
| extend Control=tostring(properties.displayName)
| where Control == '{ControlArea}'
| mvexpand Policies=properties.definition.properties.assessmentDefinitions
| extend PolicyID= Policies.id
| parse PolicyID with * "/assessmentMetadata/" AssessmentName
| project AssessmentName
| join (securityresources | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments" | extend AssessmentName=name) on AssessmentName
| extend Policy=tostring(properties.displayName)
| distinct Policy

content.query:
securityresources 
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| extend assessment=name,Problem=properties.displayName,AffectedResource=tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Id),Status=tostring(properties.status.code),Remediation=strcat("https://",properties.links.azurePortal),Severity=properties.metadata.severity
| where Problem in ({Policy}) and resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) and Status == "Unhealthy"
| project assessment,Problem,AffectedResource,Severity,Status,Remediation,resourceGroup,subscriptionId
| extend ResourceGroup=strcat("/subscriptions/",subscriptionId,"/resourceGroups/",resourceGroup)
| project assessment,Problem,AffectedResource,Severity,Status,Remediation,ResourceGroup,subscriptionId
content.title: Resource Compliance
content.noDataMessage: No recommendations for the selected control

parameters.name: ControlArea
parameters.label: Control Area
parameters.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securescores/securescorecontrols"
| extend Control=tostring(properties.displayName)
| distinct Control

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securescores/securescorecontrols"
| extend Control=tostring(properties.displayName)
| where Control == '{ControlArea}'
| mvexpand Policies=properties.definition.properties.assessmentDefinitions
| extend PolicyID= Policies.id
| parse PolicyID with * "/assessmentMetadata/" AssessmentName
| project AssessmentName
| join (securityresources | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments" | extend AssessmentName=name) on AssessmentName
| extend AssessmentName,Policy=tostring(properties.displayName)
| distinct Policy

content.query:
securityresources 
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| extend assessment=name,Problem=properties.displayName,AffectedResource=tolower(properties.resourceDetails.Id),Status=tostring(properties.status.code),Remediation=strcat("https://",properties.links.azurePortal),Severity=properties.metadata.severity
| project assessment,Problem,AffectedResource,Severity,Status,Remediation,resourceGroup,subscriptionId
| where Problem in ({Policy}) and Status == "Unhealthy"
| join (resources | mvexpand tags| extend AffectedResource = tolower(id),Tags=tags, resourceGroup 
| extend tagName = tostring(bag_keys(tags)[0])
| extend tagValue = tostring(tags[tagName])
| where tagName has '{TagName}' and tagValue has '{TagValue}'
| project AffectedResource,tagName,tagValue) on AffectedResource
| extend ResourceGroup=strcat("/subscriptions/",subscriptionId,"/resourceGroups/",resourceGroup)
| project assessment,Problem,AffectedResource,Severity,Status,Remediation,tagName,tagValue,ResourceGroup,subscriptionId
content.title: Resource Compliance
content.noDataMessage: No recommendations for the selected controls
